resources.string:
Big changes are coming!! For details see http://www.cadpage.org/faq/cadpage-2-0
 Updated 12/17/2018
 
 v2.0.4-1
 Cadpage will prompt user to install new message support app if required
 
 Location Fixes:
 Montgomery County, MD
 St Louis County, MO
 Lawrence County, PA
 Mercer County, PA
 Venango County, PA
 
 General Fixes
 Another attempt to fix MMS message processing
